abstract: Combining the magic of Bluetooth with the wonders of Caller ID, a new wireless headset lets you see who is calling right on the earpiece.
snippet: Combining the magic of Bluetooth with the wonders of Caller ID, a new wireless headset lets you see who is calling right on the earpiece.
lead_paragraph: Combining the magic of Bluetooth with the wonders of Caller ID, a new wireless headset lets you see who is calling right on the earpiece. The BlueAnt V12 Bluetooth headset has a backlit L.C.D. screen that displays the phone number of the caller alongside other information like battery and volume levels.

headline.main: A Wireless Way to See Who’s Calling
headline.print_headline: A Wireless Way to See Who’s Calling
